医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
制定新指南以协助管理妊娠期血癌一套新的指南已经制定，以协助妊娠期严重血癌的诊断和专家管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/New-guidelines-development-to-assist-with-the-management-of-blood-cancers-in-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/New-guidelines-development-to-assist-with-the-management-of-blood-cancers-in-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0be2b83-4072-41f0-8815-9d29beb1b317 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:59:00 -0500 New guidelines developed to assist with the management of blood cancers in pregnancy
叶子表面的 RNA 在塑造植物微生物组中发挥着重要作用印第安纳大学伯明顿分校的生物学家表明，植物叶子的表面涂有多种 RNA 分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/RNA-on-leaf-surfaces-plays-role-in-shaping-plant-microbiomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/RNA-on-leaf-surfaces-plays-role-in-shaping-plant-microbiomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2d1874e-afce-40a4-97a3-fcc6e9698def Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:50:00 -0500 RNA on leaf surfaces plays role in shaping plant microbiomes
城市扩张阻碍了代际流动并加剧了不平等城市扩张不仅难看。犹他大学地理学家最近领导的一系列研究表明，这还可能阻碍低收入居民的代际流动并加剧种族不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Urban-sprawl-hampers-inter Generational-mobility-and-reinforces-inequality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Urban-sprawl-hampers-inter Generational-mobility-and-reinforces-inequality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0760d9a-e064-4fcb-ba15-3a5a04d4a902 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:43:00 -0500 Urban sprawl hampers intergenerational mobility and reinforces inequality
研究确定了评估黑色素瘤患者脑肿瘤反应的最佳成像方法布莱根妇女医院放射科的 Raymond Y. Huang 医学博士、哲学博士是《临床肿瘤学杂志》上发表的论文“黑色素瘤患者颅内反应评估标准的比较分析”的通讯作者CheckMate 204 中纳武单抗 + 伊匹单抗联合治疗的脑转移瘤。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-identizes-best-imaging-methods-for-evaluating-brain-tumor-response-in-melanoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-identizes-best-imaging-methods-for-evaluating-brain-tumor-response-in-melanoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=482de984-c921-4680-9bcf-8adec4876fc6 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:35:00 -0500 Study identifies best imaging methods for evaluating brain tumor response in melanoma patients
研究揭示人类和小鼠 PD-1 在癌症研究中的主要差异自 20 世纪 90 年代发现以来，“程序性细胞死亡蛋白 1”（即 PD-1）一直被视为癌症治疗的主要靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-reveals-major-differences- Between- human-and-mouse-PD-1-in-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-reveals-major-differences- Between- human-and-mouse-PD-1-in-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0939e46-73fe-436b-8f5b-63713bf84abe Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:26:00 -0500 Study reveals major differences between human and mouse PD-1 in cancer research
研究揭示多语言对自闭症儿童的认知优势加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项新研究为说多种语言的认知益处提供了越来越多的证据，发现多种语言不仅可以增强一般认知能力，还可能有助于减少某些症状，并加强对患有以下疾病的儿童的日常思想和行为的控制：没有自闭症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Research-reveals-cognitive-advantages-of-multilingualism-for-autistic-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Research-reveals-cognitive-advantages-of-multilingualism-for-autistic-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=135c4e5c-bc04-4dbe-815f-cbe60d6e80da Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:17:00 -0500 Research reveals cognitive advantages of multilingualism for autistic children
研究显示丹佛青少年无家可归率惊人今天发表在《儿科》杂志上的第一项此类研究对科罗拉多州丹佛市青少年无家可归情况进行了全面评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-youth-homeless-in-Denver.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-youth-homeless-in-Denver.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79fc61ff-b344-4fdf-a314-1824c37e4818 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:09:00 -0500 Study reveals alarming rates of youth homelessness in Denver
在化石中发现进化军备竞赛的最古老证据美国自然历史博物馆的研究人员领导的一项新研究呈现了进化军备竞赛化石记录中已知最古老的例子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Oldest-evidence-of-evolutionary-arms-race-found-in-fossils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Oldest-evidence-of-evolutionary-arms-race-found-in-fossils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99226848-9b6b-411a-a833-04a8eccc5d54 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:03:00 -0500 Oldest evidence of evolutionary arms race found in fossils
艾莉森·埃利奥特教授因其对全球健康的贡献而荣获 OBE 勋章领先的临床研究员艾莉森·埃利奥特教授因其对医学和全球健康的贡献而被授予国王新年荣誉勋章。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Professor-Alison-Elliott-honored-with-OBE-for-contributions-to-global-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Professor-Alison-Elliott-honored-with-OBE-for-contributions-to-global-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3449a794-c7ee-4edf-bab3-6898ff710310 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 18:51:00 -0500 Professor Alison Elliott honored with OBE for contributions to global health
蛋白质稳态的突破为预防阿尔茨海默病提供了潜力科学家们发现了对抗神经退行性疾病的强大盟友：核仁复合物通过蛋白质稳态（蛋白质稳态）在维持细胞健康方面发挥着关键作用，细胞通过蛋白质稳态维持其蛋白质的平衡和正常功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Breakthrough-in- Protein-homeostasis-offers-pottial-for-preventing-Alzheimere28099s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Breakthrough-in- Protein-homeostasis-offers-pottial-for-preventing-Alzheimere28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0311ee20-2786-456f-8dc9-fad8e15b6f4a Fri, 03 Jan 2025 18:43:00 -0500 Breakthrough in protein homeostasis offers potential for preventing Alzheimer’s
